ResearchProjectDef.label: stockpile crates
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows colonists to build large crates for more compact storage.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Efficient storage
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows colonists to build even better powered storage solutions.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Wireless item transfer
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows colonists to build machines that can transfer items to and from industrial storage units.
